txt_en: What's done cannot be undone.
txt_cn: 覆水难收。

txt_en: Never give up until the fight is over.
txt_cn: 永远不要放弃，要一直战斗到最后一秒。

txt_en: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
txt_cn: 世间多苦难，但苦难总是能战胜的。

txt_en: You are so much more than how you look.
txt_cn: 你比你的外表更有魅力。

txt_en: Eternity is not a distance but a decision.
txt_cn: 永远不是一种距离，而是一种决定。

txt_en: The deepest and heaviest love must grow up with the time.
txt_cn: 最深最重的爱，须与时日共成长。

txt_en: A timely snow promises a good harvest.
txt_cn: 瑞雪兆丰年。

txt_en: Sometimes things go better when you just say no.
txt_cn: 有时候拒绝会让事情变得更好。

txt_en: I know I have this great potential.
txt_cn: 我知道我有巨大的潜力。

txt_en: They tell me that I'm crazy, but I'll never let them change me.
txt_cn: 就算他们叫我疯子，我也不会因此改变分毫。

txt_en: Everything that has a beginning has an end.
txt_cn: 世间万物有始皆有终。

txt_en: I just have to live my truth.
txt_cn: 我必须活出真实的自己。

txt_en: Witnesses pass, but history is eternal. - From China Daily
txt_cn: 逝者长已矣，历史永铭记。

txt_en: No victory comes without a price.
txt_cn: 凡是成功就要付出代价。

txt_en: Be good. Be bad. Just be yourself.
txt_cn: 是好还是坏，只要做你自己就好。

txt_en: I'm trying everything.
txt_cn: 我什么都要试试。

txt_en: The future is not ours to see. What will be will be.
txt_cn: 我们不能预见未来。顺其自然吧。

txt_en: While there is life, there is hope.
txt_cn: 生命不息，希望不止。

txt_en: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
txt_cn: 除非有勇气离开岸边，否则你永远游不到彼岸。

txt_en: However bad life may seem, there is always something you can do, and succeed at.
txt_cn: 无论生活多么艰辛，你总会有自己的方式发光。

txt_en: When I shiver with cold, not a snowflake is innocent.
txt_cn: 当我冷得瑟瑟发抖时，没有一片雪花是无辜的。

txt_en: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
txt_cn: 移开山头的人总是从搬小石头开始。

txt_en: Kept in a small bowl, the goldfish will remain small.
txt_cn: 呆在小鱼缸里的金鱼永远不会长大。

txt_en: Come on and let it snow!
txt_cn: 来吧，下一场雪！

txt_en: I wish every day is merry, not just Christmas.
txt_cn: 我希望每天都快乐，不止圣诞。

txt_en: It's no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
txt_cn: 回顾昨天毫无用处，因为我已今非昔比。

txt_en: I wouldn't give up being myself for even one second.
txt_cn: 要让我放弃做自己，哪怕一秒钟都不行。
